testcase.classname: APIUS015 As an administrator, I want to be able to access customer addresses registered in the system, add new addresses and update existing addresses via API connection.
testcase.name: APIUS015_TC006 When a PATCH request body containing valid authorization information and incorrect data is sent to the /api/profile/addressUpdate/(x) endpoint, it should be verified that the status code returned is 404 and the message information in the response body is "address not found".
testcase.system-out: * Api kullanicisi sistemde "admin" olarak giris yapar.......................passed * Api kullanicisi "api,profile,addressUpdate,75" path parametreleri set eder.passed * Api kullanicisi addressUpdate PATCH yapmak icin body hazirlar.............passed * Api kullanicisi PATCH yaparak response kaydeder...........................passed * Api user tests that returned status code after PATCH process is 404.......passed * Api user tests that after PATCH process message informatin in response bosy is "not found".passed
